hadiths.text: Ibn Masu’d reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “ A woman should not rub her body directly with the body of another woman so that she describes it to her husband as if he were looking at her.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُؤْمَرُ بِهِ مِنْ غَضِّ الْبَصَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Command To Lower The Gaze
